    • Constructor Detail

      • GVRSphereSceneObject

        public GVRSphereSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext)
        Constructs a sphere scene object with a radius of 1 and 18 stacks, and 36 slices. The sphere's triangles and normals are facing out and the same texture will be applied to each side of the sphere.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext

      • GVRSphereSceneObject

        public GVRSphereSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                            boolean facingOut)
        Constructs a sphere scene object with a radius of 1 and 18 stacks, and 36 slices. The sphere's triangles and normals are facing either in or out and the same texture will be applied to each side of the sphere.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        facingOut - whether the triangles and normals should be facing in or facing out.

      • GVRSphereSceneObject

        public GVRSphereSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                            boolean facingOut,
                            float radius)
        Constructs a sphere scene object 18 stacks, and 36 slices. The sphere's triangles and normals are facing either in or out and the same texture will be applied to each side of the sphere.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        facingOut - whether the triangles and normals should be facing in or facing out.
        radius - sets the sphere with the radius parameter. Radius must be > 0 otherwise, set it to the default of 1

      • GVRSphereSceneObject

        public GVRSphereSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                            int stackNumber,
                            int sliceNumber,
                            boolean facingOut)
        Constructs a sphere scene object with a radius of 1 and 18 stacks, and 36 slices. The sphere's triangles and normals are facing either in or out and the same texture will be applied to each side of the sphere.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        stackNumber - the number of stacks for the sphere. It should be equal or greater than 3.
        sliceNumber - the number of slices for the sphere. It should be equal or greater than 4.
        facingOut - whether the triangles and normals should be facing in or facing out.

      • GVRSphereSceneObject

        public GVRSphereSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                            boolean facingOut,
                            java.util.concurrent.Future<GVRTexture> futureTexture)
        Constructs a sphere scene object with a radius of 1 and 18 stacks, and 36 slices. The sphere's triangles and normals are facing either in or out and the same texture will be applied to each side of the sphere.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        facingOut - whether the triangles and normals should be facing in or facing out.
        futureTexture - the texture for the sphere. Future<GVRTexture> is used here for asynchronously loading the texture.

      • GVRSphereSceneObject

        public GVRSphereSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                            int stackNumber,
                            int sliceNumber,
                            boolean facingOut,
                            java.util.concurrent.Future<GVRTexture> futureTexture)
        Constructs a sphere scene object with a radius of 1 and 18 stacks, and 36 slices. The sphere's triangles and normals are facing either in or out and the same texture will be applied to each side of the sphere.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        stackNumber - the number of stacks for the sphere. It should be equal or greater than 3.
        sliceNumber - the number of slices for the sphere. It should be equal or greater than 4.
        facingOut - whether the triangles and normals should be facing in or facing out.
        futureTexture - the texture for the sphere. Future<GVRTexture> is used here for asynchronously loading the texture.

      • GVRSphereSceneObject

        public GVRSphereSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                            boolean facingOut,
                            GVRMaterial material)
        Constructs a sphere scene object with a radius of 1 and 18 stacks, and 36 slices. The sphere's triangles and normals are facing either in or out and the same material will be applied to each side of the sphere.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        facingOut - whether the triangles and normals should be facing in or facing out.
        material - the material for the sphere.

      • GVRSphereSceneObject

        public GVRSphereSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                            int stackNumber,
                            int sliceNumber,
                            boolean facingOut,
                            GVRMaterial material)
        Constructs a sphere scene object with a radius of 1 and user specified stack and slice numbers. The sphere's triangles and normals are facing either in or out and the same material will be applied to each side of the sphere.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        stackNumber - the number of stacks for the sphere. It should be equal or greater than 3.
        sliceNumber - the number of slices for the sphere. It should be equal or greater than 4.
        facingOut - whether the triangles and normals should be facing in or facing out.
        material - the material for the sphere.

      • GVRSphereSceneObject

        public GVRSphereSceneObject(GVRContext gvrContext,
                            int stackNumber,
                            int sliceNumber,
                            boolean facingOut,
                            GVRMaterial material,
                            int stackSegmentNumber,
                            int sliceSegmentNumber)
        Constructs a sphere scene object with a radius of 1 and user specified stack and slice numbers. The sphere is subdivided into MxN meshes, where M=sliceSegmengNumber and N=(stackSegmentNumber+2) are specified by user. The sphere's triangles and normals are facing either in or out and the same material will be applied to each side of the sphere.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        stackNumber - the number of stacks for the sphere. It should be equal or greater than 3.
        sliceNumber - the number of slices for the sphere. It should be equal or greater than 4.
        facingOut - whether the triangles and normals should be facing in or facing out.
        material - the material for the sphere.
        stackSegmentNumber - the segment number along vertical direction (i.e. stacks). Note neither top cap nor bottom cap are subdivided along vertical direction. So number of stacks in body part (i.e. stackNumber-2) should be divisible by stackSegmentNumber.
        sliceSegmentNumber - the segment number along horizontal direction (i.e. slices). Number of slices (i.e. sliceNumber) should be divisible by sliceSegmentNumber.
